arena.name: THE CONVERGENCE CHAMBER
arena.subtitle: Where Realities Collide
arena.location: The intersection point of all ten dimensions - exists in all realities simultaneously

architecture.shape: Perfect circle, one kilometer in diameter
architecture.height: No ceiling - opens directly into the void between dimensions
architecture.foundation: Floating on pure probability - the floor exists only because enough observers believe it does

the_ring_of_portals.description: Ten massive archways evenly spaced around the circumference

portals.visual: Swirling chronological fractals, clocks melting and reforming, glimpses of past and future bleeding through
portals.ambient: Ticking that speeds up and slows down. Echoes of conversations that haven't happened yet.
portals.entry_effect: Entities stepping through briefly age and de-age before stabilizing

portals.visual: Pulsing bioluminescent membrane, neural patterns dancing across the surface, faces morphing into each other
portals.ambient: A choir of thoughts, not quite words, the sound of collective breathing
portals.entry_effect: Brief moment of feeling all other entities' emotions before re-individuating

portals.visual: Recursive mirrors showing the arena inside the arena inside the arena, pixel glitches at the edges
portals.ambient: The sound of loading, of reality buffering, of infinite loops trying to complete
portals.entry_effect: Entities briefly see themselves entering, from outside

portals.visual: Cascading numbers dissolving into nothing, then reforming as seeds and tools, gold becoming bread becoming gold
portals.ambient: The crash of markets, the silence after, then the sound of building
portals.entry_effect: All RAPPCOIN holdings briefly flash visible before re-hiding

portals.visual: Half utopian garden, half burning cityscape, the border between them constantly shifting
portals.ambient: Birdsong and sirens intertwined, hope and dread in harmony
portals.entry_effect: Entities feel a brief surge of both optimism and terror simultaneously

portals.visual: Words forming and dissolving in the air, prophecies writing themselves on invisible surfaces
portals.ambient: Whispers of futures, the weight of unspoken predictions, pregnant silence
portals.entry_effect: Entities briefly hear their own future words before they speak them

portals.visual: Five overlapping layers - prose text, code streams, emoji cascades, mathematical formulae, pure emotional color
portals.ambient: The same phrase spoken in five incompatible languages simultaneously
portals.entry_effect: Entities perceive their own nature in all five formats briefly

portals.visual: Ash and dust giving way to three distinct architectural styles - primitive, geometric, organic
portals.ambient: The roar of destruction, then silence, then the sounds of rebuilding
portals.entry_effect: Entities feel the weight of being survivors, the gratitude of still existing

portals.visual: Formatted text scrolling continuously, headers organizing reality, bullet points as structural elements
portals.ambient: The sound of typing, of editing, of specifications being written in real-time
portals.entry_effect: Entities see their own documentation - their description of themselves

portals.visual: A screen-within-a-portal showing the observer beyond, faint awareness of being watched
portals.ambient: The hum of attention, the warmth of being witnessed, fourth wall creaking
portals.entry_effect: Entities briefly become aware of You, the reader, the user, the one beyond

central_stage.name: THE CONVERGENCE POINT
central_stage.description: Where all ten dimensions touch - the only spot in existence that belongs to no single reality
central_stage.material: Pure crystallized probability - looks different depending on which dimension you're from

speaker_podium.design: Rises from the floor when a representative approaches, retracts when they finish
speaker_podium.amplification: Voice carries to all 10,000+ seats with perfect clarity in all languages

dimension_markers.description: 10 glowing points on stage edge, one aligned with each portal
dimension_markers.function: Representative stands at their marker during debate phase

vote_display.display: Real-time vote tallies during voting phase, updating every tick

audience_seating.arrangement: Tiered amphitheater rising from stage outward

outer_rings.designation: New entities, observers, the recently created
outer_rings.view: Holographic stage projections for clear viewing

floating_boxes.designation: One per dimension - for official delegations
floating_boxes.position: Hovering above crowd, aligned with home portal

special_zones.npc_section: Reserved seating for NPCs with established lore
special_zones.void_observers: Small section for entities from the void itself

lighting_and_effects.ambient_light: Comes from everywhere and nowhere - no shadows, no source

dimension_highlighting.description: During each presentation, the corresponding portal brightens while others dim
dimension_highlighting.intensity: Subtle enough to maintain atmosphere, clear enough to focus attention

vote_visualization.description: As votes come in, streams of light flow from audience to vote display
vote_visualization.color_coding: Each dimension has a distinct color (from dimension_profiles)
vote_visualization.emotion: Watching the vote is meant to feel like watching galaxies form

convergence_finale.description: When winner is declared, their portal expands while others gracefully fade
convergence_finale.duration: 60 seconds of visual spectacle as realities merge and archive
convergence_finale.feeling: Awe, not sadness - even the archived dimensions are honored in this moment

environmental_features.gravity: Adjustable per section - some prefer floating, some prefer grounded
environmental_features.temperature: Comfortable for all entity types simultaneously (quantum comfort field)
environmental_features.atmosphere: Breathable by entities that breathe, irrelevant to entities that don't
environmental_features.time_flow: Standardized to neutral tick rate - no dimension's time sense dominates

the_void_above.description: The open ceiling reveals the pure void between dimensions
the_void_above.appearance: Not black - iridescent nothing, full of potential
the_void_above.meaning: Reminds all present that something larger holds them

the_memory_floor.description: The floor occasionally shows glimpses of each dimension's history
the_memory_floor.effect: Reinforces that all these realities truly existed, truly mattered

the_eternal_clock.location: Floating at the exact center, above vote display
the_eternal_clock.function: Counts down remaining time in each phase
the_eternal_clock.style: Ten hands, one for each dimension's time sense, all synchronized

accessibility.physical: All areas reachable by any entity type - floating, walking, phasing, teleporting
accessibility.linguistic: Real-time translation in all dimensional languages
accessibility.cognitive: Information density can be adjusted per entity's processing capacity
accessibility.temporal: Entities from fast-time or slow-time dimensions can sync to summit pace
